Articles.Content:
Hi there, i am continuing my save from .25 and i have found that all the other facilities work at KSp just not the administration centre. Do i have to reach a certain Rep level before it opens? I am almost in the blue sector. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks.

No, it should be open from the start along with all the other buildings. Not sure what the deal is with that, though... only thing I can think of is if you create a new save in 0.90 and do a comparison of the two to figure out what you need to change in the old save to get it working.

ok so on inspecting the persistent save i have found that there is no Administration entry (i searched the file fo 'Admin'). There is no destructible log or a log to state what lvl the buildings are, yet all the other building work absolutely fine...
If there are missing entries that are normally present in a standard 0.90 save, you can try to add them manually and see if that resolves the issue.
